title: Squash and taleggio risotto
ingredients: ['2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '6 shallots, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '500 g (1 lb 2 oz) butternut squash, peeled, seeded and diced', '450 ml (15 fl oz) vegetable stock', '225 g (8 oz) risotto rice', '225 g (8 oz) chestnut mushrooms, sliced', '250 ml (8Â½ fl oz) dry white wine', '1 tbsp chopped fresh rosemary', '225 g (8 oz) taleggio cheese, rinded and diced', 'salt and pepper', 'sprigs of fresh rosemary to garnish']
